heading: Programming and Data for Policymakers [DPI-691M]
paragraph1: You should take this course whether or not you plan to code for a living.
bulletPoints: Learn how to pick up new technical skills (in PYTHON language) on your own.
Learn how to ask the right questions to identify someone trying to sell you bad technology.
Understand the value of open source technology in Government.
Speak with experts and coders on the topic.
